author: y19y19
body:
#### PR description:
Add SONIC producer for Unified Particle Transformer model, located in https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/tree/master/UParTAK4/PUPPI/V01

Fix a bug in PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/python/slimming/miniAOD_tools.py
title: Add UParT_V01 model Sonic producer and fix a bug in miniAOD_tools.py
